lines.text: Steatopygias. It means "rump," so whenever a fat-ass walks in the room... well, someone like you... you'd say, "Well, Cal, you're certainly steatopygias." It's better than fat-ass because you and anyone else wouldn't know what the fuck I'm talkin' about.

[angrily]
I guess you don't want to make any records for the rest of your life, you jerk! Hey, hey...
Jonah, you wouldn't by any chance be fucking my wife, would you? Because that wouldn't be conducive to a good artist-record company relationship.
Well, what was I supposed to say? "Yes, Walter, I am sort of fucking your wife"?
Is that what we're doing, sort of fucking?
Anna Freud came backstage last week -- Anna Freud. She sold us some blow.
